messages.title: Change in Tottenham
messages.content: Sean Sullivan promises change in Tottenham, highlighting the need for economic revitalization and addressing social issues.

messages.title: Working for Tottenham
messages.content: Sullivan discusses tackling local issues, like reclaiming open spaces and improving public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sean outlines steps to address social and economic challenges in Tottenham, criticizing the incumbent party's failures.
Promises to safeguard pensions and improve elderly care.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Reference to local GP surgeries closing down and a call to action to save them suggests a strategic issue of healthcare access.

issues.economy: Critiques the economic mismanagement and promises a change.
issues.health: Closure of local GP surgeries and fighting to save local hospital services.
issues.socialWelfare: Protection for pensioners and efforts to improve care for the elderly.

housing.content: Tackling the issue of reclaiming open spaces, potentially for housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sean Sullivan presents his vision for Tottenham, emphasizing his commitment to bringing about change.

images.caption: Images show Sean Sullivan in community interactions, with text supporting his policies and campaign for change.
